articles.title: 67-Million-Year Old T-Rex Skeleton To Be Auctioned In Europe Next Month - NDTV
articles.description: A Tyrannosaurus-Rex skeleton dating back 67-million years will be auctioned in Switzerland next month, marking the first such sale in Europe, the auction house said Saturday.
articles.content:
The T-rex skeleton is expected to fetch millions of dollars. (Representational)
